name: Ugly Delicious Stock and Soup Company, The
text:
The First Good Thing
BREAKFAST
Fresh-cracked eggs to fuel the body, bread to steady the heart, and small, savoury comforts to soften the start. A quiet ritual. A warm welcome to the day ahead.

The Good MMMuffin - $7

House-made English muffin stacked with egg, cheese, tomato, ham & honey mustard.

The Northerner - $7

House-made English muffin with egg, cheese, fried baloney, sautéed onion & yellow mustard.

Dirty Rice & Chorizo Wrap - $10

Scrambled egg, cheese, dirty rice, spicy chorizo, tomato, & sour cream all wrapped in a soft flour tortilla. Served with a side of salsa.

The Ugly Delicious Waffle - $10 (Add ice cream $5)

A single golden waffle with a crisp edge and tender vanilla center. Served warm with fresh fruit, a cloud of house-made whipped cream, and a sprinkle of cinnamon sugar.

Breakfast Potatoes - $5

Seasoned breakfast potatoes, hand-tossed in oil air-fried to crispy perfection.

ESPRESSO a Seductive Cup
Bold, bright, and wide-eyed. The kind of cup that meets you gently, warms hands, and shifts the whole shape of your morning—before the first sip ever.

Ristretto (short, bold)

Espresso (the OG)

Lungo (longer pull, smoother strength)

Americano (espresso + hot water)

Latte (espresso + steamed milk)

Cappuccino (equal parts espresso, milk)

Latte Macchiato (milk kissed with espresso)

Espresso Macchiato (espresso topped with a little foam)

Steamed Milk/Hot Foam

The Mid-Day Offering
LUNCH
Made with love of all good things. Soups that hold you. Breads that ground you. Spreads to inspire you. Plates prepared like a gift—quiet, soulful, and full of heart.

Soulful Soup

Expertly crafted soup served with fresh baked bread.

Starter soup - $8

Lunch soup - $14

While You Wait Plate - $7

Fresh bread, served warm with house-made spread.

House Made Meatballs - $15

Tender house-made meatballs in rustic tomato sauce, served with fresh-baked bread.

Falafel Plate - $13

Crisp falafel balls served with house-made humus, creamy tzatziki, with warm naan bread.

Risotto Balls - $14

Three golden risotto balls made with Arborio rice, parmesan, mozzarella & herbs. Served with fresh baked bread.

Chicken Parm Sandwich - $14

Crisp breaded chicken, tomato sauce, mozzarella, lettuce, tomato, with basil mayo served on a thick slice of fresh bread.

The Mediterranean Quesadilla - $13 (Add chicken $3)

Sun-dried tomatoes, fresh spinach, roasted red peppers, Kalamata olives, feta, mozzarella & fresh dill. Served with house made tzatziki.
ESPRESSO MENU
Crafted with care on our SPRSO machine. Sip slow, feel good.
